content: these pumpkin hats are a must for the little people in your life sizes 6 months 9- 12 months 1 - 3 years 4 - 6 years 7 - 10 years adult each hat requires dk yarn in orange 20g - 40g depending on the size made and a small amount of green for the stalk 4mm knitting needles gauge / gauge 22sts = 4 10cm very easy to knit - worked flat and then seamed so sweet and cute happy knitting **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
